projects.title: Axon Records
projects.description: We are building the next generation Records Management System to help law enforcement solve crime faster and prevent it from occurring in the future. This is our vision.

projects.title: xflex
projects.description: xflex is a is a configurable grid and layout engine for React. With xflex, you can eliminate your layout css or reduce it to just a few lines. Check out the github project.

projects.title: ssim
projects.description: ssim is javascript project that implements and replicates the image comparison algorithms described by Zhou Wang et al. The code is available here.

projects.title: WISDM
projects.description: With Jeremy Magland, PhD at University of Pennsylvania, we developed WISDM (Web-Interactive Scientific Data Manager) a cloud based solution for fMRI analysis and neuroimaging data sharing.

projects.title: PlaceLocal
projects.description: I've had the opportunity to develop tools to create and manage cross-platform programmatic creatives with Thunder. Check out the promo video.
